subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Kristin's Files/DONT CRY PLEASE PLEASE DONT CRY.wav 
  Uploaded by : nitsirk65 <ckmorris95@...> 
  Description : They tell me PLEASE DONT CRY.  This is raw -unedited audio 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Kristin%27s%20Files/DONT%20CRY%20PLEASE%20PLEASE%20DONT%20CRY.wav
